derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from ecclesiastical Latin noviciatus, from Latin novicius 'new' (see novice)

means.word_mean: 1. the period during which you are a novice (especially in a religious order)
2. someone who has entered a religious order but has not taken final vows
